description:
Speak our language!
We are Lingoda.
Our mission is to build bridges through life-changing language learning.

Lingoda is a fast-growing online language school for language learners aspiring to provide a human-centric, personalized and seamless learning experience unmatched by competitors. With Lingoda, you're not just learning - you're teaming up with an expert who understands your goals and guides you to success, every step of the way.
Our classes are teacher-led, and supported in- and out-of-class by the latest technologies and a unique curriculum to empower our students to achieve their language goals. High-quality classes are available online 24/7, so anyone anywhere has the opportunity to learn a language with Lingoda.
As a company we bring out the best in people with a positive culture. We challenge ourselves, and we challenge others. We work smart and make it happen. We believe in personal growth and inclusion.
We work hard to contribute to a better society. How? Here are three examples:

Lingoda’s MATCH network and Global Career Centre seek to upskill and match migrants to career opportunities in Germany, supporting them through government-funded education programs

In the German healthcare sector, we support international nurses, doctors and midwives to obtain language and professional recognition through state-sponsored education programs. As a result we have become one of the largest educational providers in this field in Germany

In December 2022, we won “Best Digital Learning Product of the Year” at the Digital Education Awards 2022

We are currently looking for a Communications & Partnerships Manager(all genders) based in Berlin (or elsewhere in Germany).

Your mission with us:
Join our Brand Team to develop and leverage strong brand partnerships that help us expand our awareness among relevant audiences, increase our reach and deepen our connection with students around the world.

Your tasks:
- Pitch, develop and secure working relationships with relevant brands or organizations in coordination with our Head of Brand
- Focus on brand partnerships and campaigns that strengthen our story and help us reach our target audiences
- Organize and attend events to grow Lingoda’s network to grow a strong network of relevant contacts and leaders across Germany and the US and act as go-to-person for all their requests
- Develop innovative consumer-focused campaign angles that position Lingoda as a leader in the online language learning space
- Set, analyze and report on various partnership activities to stakeholders across the company
- Collaborate with a variety of people at all levels of the organization and meet stringent deadlines in a fast-paced work environment

You bring to Lingoda:
- You have successfully completed your studies with a focus on PR, communications, marketing or comparable training
- 4-6 years of professional PR or partnerships experience in a multiple language/country environment
- Experience managing and collaborating with external entities, with a proven track record of securing strategic partnerships that measurably grew a company’s brand awareness
- Experience with entering new markets via partnerships with a focus on the US and Germany
- A track record of launching campaigns and events in multiple languages and countries
- Research and analytical skills as well as curiosity
- You are engaged and a voracious follower of current events and trends
- Exceptional written and verbal communication skills in English and German
- Existing corporate, non-profit, or education connections in Germany and the US
- Nice to have: You have experience in both consumer and corporate PR

You add to our culture:
- The ability to react quickly and agile to rapidly changing conditions
- Creativity in coming up with new ways to promote business and approaching new potential partners
- A can-do attitude ad excitement to grow a brand partnerships program from the ground-up

You can expect from Lingoda:
- Approachable leaders and transparent communication - every voice counts at Lingoda!
- Company events and colleagues who are always happy to socialize + budgets towards team building events!
- An inclusive environment with great team spirit and passion for languages
- A well-structured and exciting onboarding process to set you up for success!
- The possibility to work remotely from your home or in the office located in the heart of Berlin
- Education funds because we want to see our people grow
- **Free access** to our language classes
- Mental Health programs
- Corporate benefits & pension funds
- 28 vacation days per year
- Free snacks & drinks at the office
- The modern hardware necessary for your work
- Flexible working hours
